br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Acts as a link between the visual elements and the logic ones. The visual layer is a listener for the Controller, calling one of its methods when a triggering event (such as input from the player) happens.

      • playerLifeChanged

        public void playerLifeChanged(int amount)
        Updates the player life to the BattlePlatform and LifeBar objects.
        Parameters:
        amount - If negative, it means the player has taken the amount of damage. If positive, it means the player was healed by the specified amount.

      • enemyLifeChanged

        public void enemyLifeChanged(int amount)
        Updates the enemy life to the BattlePlatform and LifeBar objects.
        Parameters:
        amount - If negative, it means the enemy has taken the amount of damage. If positive, it means the enemy was healed by the specified amount.
